definition: affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly

sentences.english: Chinese State Councilor Ma Kai has recently concluded his visit to the EU headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 不久前，马凯国务委员成功访问欧盟总部。

sentences.english: This afternoon, State Councilor Dai Bingguo will meet with him.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午戴秉国国务委员也将会见他。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other Chinese companions attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员唐家璇等中方陪同人员参加会见。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other members of the entourage arrived by the same plane.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员唐家璇等陪同人员同机抵达。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan was present at the meetings.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员唐家璇出席了午餐会。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other accompanying personnel arrived by the same plane.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员唐家璇等陪同人员同机抵达。

sentences.english: State councilor stresses quality education for overseas students.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员称应加强对海外留学生的素质教育。

sentences.english: Vice Premier Wang and State Counselor Dai, welcome back.
sentences.chinese: 王副总理和戴国务委员，欢迎你们再次到来。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other Chinese companions attended the above-mentioned activities.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员唐家璇等中方陪同人员参加上述活动。

sentences.english: I want to thank State CouncilorDai and Vice-Premier Wang for their very warm hospitality.
sentences.chinese: 感谢国务委员戴秉国和副总理王岐山非常热情的接待。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员唐家璇参加会见。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan attended and addressed the seminar.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员唐家璇出席会议并致辞。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other Chinese companions attended the talks.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员唐家璇等中方陪同人员参加会谈。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other officials attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员唐家璇等参加了会见。

sentences.english: State Councilor also made several instructions on how to properly handle the case.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇国务委员也就妥善处理此案多次作出指示。

sentences.english: State Councilor and Minister of Public Security Meng Jianzhu presided over the ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员兼公安部部长孟建柱主持了典礼。

definition: Yang Jiechi (1950-), Chinese politician and diplomat, foreign minister of PRC 2007-2013
president (title of the head of state of China and several other nations)
Liu Yunshan (1947-), PRC politician, background in journalism in Inner Mongolia, head of the Central Propaganda Department 2002-2012
Hu Jintao (1942-), General Secretary of the CCP 2002-2012, president of the PRC 2003-2013
Ministry of Foreign Affairs/foreign office/Dept. of State
foreign minister/secretary of state/minister of foreign affairs
